Class
Description
AboutUs
AboutUs class represents a JFrame that provides to the user information about (programmers).
AboutUs
AboutUs class represents a JFrame that provides to the user information about (programmers).
CA
This class holds the window / gui for cellular automata operations.
CSModel
This class is the starting point for the program.
GLBoard
Represents the game board for the Game of Life.
GLCell
Represents a single cell in the Game of Life grid.
GLChangeBoardSizePopUp
The GLChangeBoardSizePopUp class represents a dialog for changing the board size in the Game of Life application.
GLColorPalettePopup
The GLColorPalettePopup class represents a popup window for selecting colors from a predefined palette or using a custom color picker.
GLController
The GLController class is responsible for handling user interactions and controlling the Game of Life application.
GLDebugStage
A custom stage class that extends JavaFX's Stage class.
GLFooter
The GLFooter class represents the footer of the Game of Life application.
GLHeaderImage
The GLHeaderImage class represents a header view containing a custom image.
GLMain
The main class for launching the Game of Life application.
GLMenuBar
The GLMenuBar class provides the functionality for creating and updating a menu bar in the Game of Life application.
GLModel
The GLModel class represents the model of the Game of Life.
GLRules
The GLRules class represents the rules of the Game of Life.
GLUpdateListener
The GLUpdateListener interface provides a callback method for notifying listeners when there's an update in the game state.
GLView
The GLView class is responsible for creating and displaying the main user interface of the Game of Life application.
HelpCA
Help class represents a JFrame that provides to the user information about how this app works.
HelpMain
Help Main class represents a JFrame that provides to the user information about this application works.

Help class represents a JFrame that provides to the user information about how this app works.
HelpTMClient
Help class represents a JFrame that provides to the user information about how this app works.
HelpTMServer
Help class represents a JFrame that provides to the user information about how this app works.
LanguageManager
LanguageManager is a Singleton class responsible for managing the language settings of the application.
